lead_paragraph: David S. Ferriero, the national archivist, oversees a collection that includes original copies of the Declaration of Independence and the Constitution.
snippet: David S. Ferriero, the national archivist, oversees a collection that includes original copies of the Declaration of Independence and the Constitution.

headline.main: Collector in Chief Hoards Nation’s Irreplaceable Stuff
headline.seo: The National Archivist Keeps the Nation’s Heritage
headline.print_headline: Collector in Chief Hoards Nation’s Irreplaceable Stuff
